welcome.description:
Hello and welcome!

I'm your guide to

your first steps in CSS styles

Watch the CSS code

Did you know that you can change the background color? Let's try it using:

background-color: #8ce2ea;

When you feel your code is ready, always remember to press the RUN button.

Congratulations!

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.description:
The correct color code should be #8ce2ea

background-color: #8ce2ea;

hints.title: Hint 2
hints.description: Not quite there yet. Try again.

messagesSuccess.title: Title 1
messagesSuccess.description:
Congratulations!

You've made it!

Now you're ready to try and change the color of the text. Try this:

color: #ffffff;

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.description:
The correct color code is not there yet.

color: #ffffff;

hints.title: Hint 2
hints.description: Oops! Please try one more time.

messagesSuccess.title: Title 1
messagesSuccess.description:
Congratulations!

You've made it!

Looks like you are ready to change the text size with:

font-size: 50px;

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.description:
Right now the font size is still not 50px. Can you make it that size?

font-size: 50px;

hints.title: Hint 2
hints.description: Looks like you're having trouble. You can modify the font size inside the h1 selector. Do you see where that is in the code panel?

messagesSuccess.title: Title 1
messagesSuccess.description:
Congratulations!

You've made it!

Good! Now try to justify the text to the center adding this property:

text-align: center;

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.description:
The justification is still not correct. Please justify the text to the center. Use the following code:

text-align: center;

hints.title: Hint 2
hints.description: Still something's missing. You can change the justification of the text inside the h1 selector.

messagesSuccess.title: Title 1
messagesSuccess.description:
Congratulations!

You've made it!

Now let`s try something fun. Let`s turn the text upside-down. Use:

transform: rotate(-180deg);

hints.title: Hint 1
hints.description:
Let'st try again. Remember we want to turn the text upside-down inside the selector:

h1 {
  ...
}

hints.title: Hint 2
hints.description:
Not quite there yet... try adding this property and make sure that the code text is complete:

transform: rotate(-180deg);

messagesSuccess.title: Success 1 CSS 5
messagesSuccess.description:
Congratulations!

You've made it!

Press HOME to continue learning!
